kep.files module

kep.files module¶

File and folder locations for interim and processed CSV files.

Functions based on kep.files.Folder class methods:

  • kep.files.get_latest_date() returns latest available year and month
  • kep.files.locate_csv() retrieves interim CSV file for parsing from data/interim folder by year and month
  • based on year and month kep.files.get_processed_folder() provides location to save parsing result in data/processed folder

For housekeeping kep.files provides:

  • kep.files.init_dirs() - make directory structure on startup
  • kep.files.copy_latest() - copy CSVs to latest folder which has stable URL

For reference - data directory structure:

\data
  \interim
      \2017
      \2016
      \...
  \processed
      \latest
      \latest_json (may be depreciated)
      \2017
      \2016
      \...
kep.files.get_latest_date()[source]¶

Return year and month for latest available interim data folder.

Returns:(year, month) tuple of two integers
kep.files.locate_csv(year: int = None, month: int = None)[source]¶

Return interim CSV file based on year and month.

Returns:pathlib.Path() instance
kep.files.get_processed_folder(year, month)[source]¶

Return processed CSV file folder based on year and month.

The processed CSV file folder is used by Frames class to write output files (dfa.csv, dfq.csv, dfm.csv).

Returns:pathlib.Path() instance
class kep.files.Folder(year=None, month=None)[source]¶
